DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective proposal execute real-world database analysis evaluate hospital readmission among hospitalized nonvalvular atrial fibrillation ( NVAF ) patient U.S Primary objective : To determine proportion NVAF patient bleeding-related hospital readmission occur within 30 day hospitalization NVAF patient treat new oral anticoagulant ( NOACs ) , dabigatran , rivaroxaban , apixaban warfarin inpatient set Secondary objective : - To determine cost associate bleeding-related hospital readmission occur within 30 day hospitalization NVAF patient treat dabigatran , rivaroxaban , apixaban warfarin inpatient set - To determine proportion NVAF patient cause hospital readmission associate cost occur within 30 day hospitalization NVAF patient treat dabigatran , rivaroxaban , apixaban warfarin inpatient setting .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Hospital Readmissions Among Hospitalized Non-valvular Atrial Fibrillation ( NVAF ) Patients US
DOC.criteria: Have primary secondary diagnosis AF identify International Classification Diseases , Ninth Revision , Clinical Modification ( ICD9CM ) cod Premier Hospital database January 1 , 2012 December 31 , 2013 Age 18 year old initial hospitalization AF diagnosis Have primary secondary diagnosis code procedure code valvular disease study period . This exclusion criterion consistent use previous BMS HEOR study use ensure study population NVAF patient Received multiple type NOACs index hospitalization . Preliminary analysis show patient receive multiple type new oral anticoagulant ( NOACs ) hospitalization . This exclusion criterion allow cleanly group patient different NOAC usage group
